ComicInfo.Title: 8 New Year's Resolutions of the Rich and Famous; Guide to Dreamcast's New Realistic Video Games; Pop Stars on Broadway; Galaxy Queasy; One Christmas Eve on Death Row; Do-It-Yourself Behind the Music; Uncouth Christmas Carols; Cracked History of Humor; Monster Christmas; Hook, Line & Sink-err...; Interactive Urinal Cakes; Fat Is Phat on TV!; Cracked Stocking Stuffer; Toy Borey, Too; Worst Promotional Characters
